request.description:
Product Create
Endpoint : api/products
Use : To Create product.
Method : POST
Request : name,detail,sku_code,price,available_stock
Response: 
{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "name": "Pinapple Cake",
        "detail": "750 GM Per Pack",
        "sku_code": "Cake-07",
        "price": "700.00",
        "available_stock": "2",

        "updated_at": "2021-05-09 06:53:46",
        "created_at": "2021-05-09 06:53:46",
        "id": 12
    },
    "message": "Product created successfully."
}

Delete Product
Endpoint : api/products/<product_id>
Use : To List out products.
Method : DELETE
Request : 
Response:

Buy Product
Endpoint : api/buy/product
Use : To buy product.
Method : POST
Request : {
    "item_list": [
        {
            "product_id": "",
            "quantity": ""
        }
    ],
    "currency": {
        "one_rs_coin": 0,
        "two_rs_coin": 0,
        "five_rs_coin": 0,
        "ten_rs_coin": 0,
        "one_rs_note": 0,
        "two_rs_note": 0,
        "five_rs_note": 0,
        "ten_rs_note": 0,
        "twenty_rs_note": 0,
        "fifty_rs_note": 0,
        "hundread_rs_note": 1,
        "two_hundred_rs_note": 1,
        "five_hundred_rs_note": 2,
        "two_thousand_rs_note": 0
    },
    "continue_with_available_items": false,
    "change_priority": NULL
}
Request Explaination :
item_list : which items user selected and it quantity
currency : currency that user had added
continue_with_available_items: in case few items not available then program will executed ahead with only for available items
change_priority: if user applicable for change then in which denomination change will retrieved. possible values: max_possible,only_coins,mix_denomination
max_possible gives better result than others.
Response:
{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "booking_id": "60981c6939d07",
        "payable_amt": 240,
        "submitted_amount": 295,
        "return_amt": 55,
        "return_denomination_object": {
            "one_rs_coin": 0,
            "two_rs_coin": 0,
            "five_rs_coin": 1,
            "ten_rs_coin": 1,
            "one_rs_note": 0,
            "two_rs_note": 0,
            "five_rs_note": 0,
            "ten_rs_note": 0,
            "twenty_rs_note": 2,
            "fifty_rs_note": 0,
            "hundread_rs_note": 0,
            "two_hundred_rs_note": 0,
            "five_hundred_rs_note": 0,
            "two_thousand_rs_note": 0
        },
        "items_pay_to_users": [
            {
                "product_id": "3",
                "quantity": "2",
                "available_stock": "488",
                "price": "95.00",
                "sku_code": "Chk01",
                "name": "Chocolate Cookies",
                "detail": "100 GM Per Pack",
                "image": ""
            },
            {
                "product_id": "4",
                "quantity": "2",
                "available_stock": "146",
                "price": "25.00",
                "sku_code": "ORG-01",
                "name": "Orange Biscuit",
                "detail": "150 GM Per Pack",
                "image": ""
            }
        ]
    },
    "message": "Please review order. Current order is valid only for 5 min."
}

Review Purchase
Endpoint : api/buy/product
Use : once confirm user can decide whether to complete order or cancel order. 
action=1 for complete, action=2 for cancel
Method : POST
Request
booking_id
action
-----------------
Case: Complete
{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "return_change_denomination": {
            "one_rs_coin": "0",
            "two_rs_coin": "0",
            "five_rs_coin": "1",
            "ten_rs_coin": "1",
            "one_rs_note": "0",
            "two_rs_note": "0",
            "five_rs_note": "0",
            "ten_rs_note": "0",
            "twenty_rs_note": "2",
            "fifty_rs_note": "0",
            "hundread_rs_note": "0",
            "two_hundred_rs_note": "0",
            "five_hundred_rs_note": "0",
            "two_thousand_rs_note": "0"
        },
        "hardware_command_to_dispatch_change": "0-0-1-1-0-0-0-0-2-0-0-0-0-0",
        "hardware_command_to_dispatch_item": "3:2-4:2"
    },
    "message": "Product purchased successfull!"
}
--------------------------
Case:Cancel

{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "hardware_command_to_dispatch_submitted_currency": "3-1-1-1-1-2-0-3-2-0-0-1-0-0",
        "submitted_currency_denomination": {
            "one_rs_coin": "3",
            "two_rs_coin": "1",
            "five_rs_coin": "1",
            "ten_rs_coin": "1",
            "one_rs_note": "1",
            "two_rs_note": "2",
            "five_rs_note": "0",
            "ten_rs_note": "3",
            "twenty_rs_note": "2",
            "fifty_rs_note": "0",
            "hundread_rs_note": "0",
            "two_hundred_rs_note": "1",
            "five_hundred_rs_note": "0",
            "two_thousand_rs_note": "0"
        }
    },
    "message": "purchase_detail!"
}
